hook_text: Hey kids, I am Epsilon the Dragon! POOF! Natural numbers!

style_decision.reasoning: The 'Family Guy' reference immediately suggests a bold, humorous, and animated visual style. A cartoon approach perfectly captures the whimsical and exaggerated nature of the descriptions (e.g., 'infinite dragons', 'dragon hugs'). Vibrant colors will enhance the playful and engaging nature of the content for a general audience on Instagram, making the abstract mathematical concepts more approachable and memorable. This style aligns with typical popular content on platforms like Instagram.

positioning_decision.reasoning: Instagram's rule to avoid the bottom 20% means the bottom center is a safe and effective placement for text overlays. It keeps the text in view without obscuring crucial parts of the cartoon animation.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/calculus_dragon_ep1_20250727_105129/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='Cookies & Negatives':fontcolor=#5F27CD:fontsize=40:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,4.5\,7.0),drawtext=text='Pizza Math 🍕':fontcolor=#00D2D3:fontsize=44:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,7.5\,10.0),drawtext=text='Number Line Goals':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=48:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,13.5\,16.0),drawtext=text='Dragon Hugs 🤗':fontcolor=#54A0FF:fontsize=42:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,16.5\,19.0),drawtext=text='Nap Zones 😴':fontcolor=#96CEB4:fontsize=40:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#2C3E50@0.95:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,19.5\,22.0),drawtext=text='No Gaps ✨':fontcolor=#00D2D3:fontsize=54:font='Verdana-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,28.5\,31.0),drawtext=text='ε > 0 💡':fontcolor=#4ECDC4:fontsize=60:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#2C3E50@0.95:boxborderw=4:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,31.5\,34.0),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=56:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#FF0099@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,36.912\,38.312),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=56:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#FF0099@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,38.412\,39.812) -c:a copy -y outputs/calculus_dragon_ep1_20250727_105129/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
